name: Rahim Takhtar
story: Hasib grew up in a small village in Iran. He spent most of his childhood helping his parents with the farm work. At the age of 18, he joined the Iranian military and quickly proved his marksmanship abilities. He was recruited into the special forces and completed several successful missions. After a few years, he grew disillusioned with the politics of his country and decided to join the Altian Armed Forces for a change of scene. He now serves as a Sharpshooter in the OPFOR faction.
